Description:

To make sure P.R’s are converted to P.O’, follow up with purchase/suppliers to expedite the materials delivery.
To prioritize delivery dates as and when required by production.
Monitoring the stock levels to ensure materials availability at all times.
Working on shortage reports and ensuring a smooth flow of activities in the shop floor.
Coordination with other departments i.e., production/warehouse/design/Sales and purchase.Skills
